title: Portfolio Microservices Platform
description: A full-stack portfolio application demonstrating microservices architecture, message queues, and modern DevOps practices.
longDescription: This portfolio project showcases a complete microservices architecture with separate services for authentication, public API, admin API, and frontend applications. The system uses RabbitMQ for asynchronous communication, PostgreSQL for persistent storage, Redis for caching, and MinIO for object storage. Infrastructure is containerized with Docker and orchestrated using Docker Compose with Traefik as a reverse proxy.
features: Real-time updates using RabbitMQ message queues
RESTful APIs with comprehensive Swagger documentation
Responsive Vue.js frontend with Naive UI
Traefik reverse proxy with automatic HTTPS
challenges: Setting up proper service discovery and routing
learnings: Microservices design patterns and best practices

title: E-Commerce Platform with Payment Integration
description: Modern e-commerce platform with Stripe payment integration, real-time inventory management, and admin dashboard.
longDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce solution built with React and Node.js, featuring product catalog management, shopping cart functionality, secure payment processing through Stripe, order tracking, and a full-featured admin dashboard for inventory and order management.
features: Product catalog with search and filtering
challenges: Managing complex cart state across sessions
Optimizing database queries for product searches

title: Real-Time Chat Application
description: WebSocket-based chat application with rooms, direct messaging, file sharing, and typing indicators.
longDescription: A feature-rich real-time chat application built with Socket.io, supporting multiple chat rooms, direct messages, file uploads, emoji reactions, and presence indicators. The backend uses Redis for managing active connections and message caching.

title: Task Management SaaS Platform
description: Multi-tenant task management platform with team collaboration, kanban boards, and time tracking.
longDescription: A comprehensive SaaS platform for task and project management, featuring kanban boards, gantt charts, time tracking, team collaboration tools, and detailed analytics. Built with a multi-tenant architecture supporting multiple organizations with role-based access control.
challenges: Optimizing query performance for large datasets

title: Enterprise Software Development (NDA-Protected)
description: Professional work on closed-source enterprise applications in FinTech, IoT, and E-Commerce. Due to NDAs, source code cannot be shared.
longDescription: Led development of enterprise-level applications across multiple companies, including financial management systems handling millions of transactions daily, IoT device management platforms supporting 100K+ concurrent connections, and e-commerce platform modernization efforts. Focused on scalable architectures, microservices patterns, real-time systems, and high-performance optimization.
challenges: Scaling systems to handle millions of users
Optimizing database performance for high throughput
learnings: Security and compliance in financial systems
Leading technical teams and mentoring developers
